Player Pronoun Identifier.Description: Would usually be "is" or "are", depending on context. Example: She IS so cool! VS. They ARE so cool!

CustomMateoSoren.Description: Turns on male toddler sprites that look like Mateo.

CustomMateoDinah.Description: Turns on female toddler sprites that look like Mateo.

MermaidPendantEarring.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant earring for Mateo when married.

MermaidPendantHairclip.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant hairclip for Hector when married.

MermaidPendantChoker.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant choker for Cirrus when married.

MateoSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

MateoSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

HectorSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

HectorSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

CirrusSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

CirrusSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

SkipIntroQuest.Description: Removes the quest requirements for Hector's intro quest, in case of bugs or other issues.

DumpsterWarp.Description: May cause some pathing issues, but offers a shortcut to the Druid Tower.

ExcludeFromPerfection.Description: Excludes S&S items from Perfection tracking.

MateoTrollHeritage.Description: Gives Mateo horns and unique eye color based on their parentage.

CirrusRainbowHair.AllowValues: RealisticRandom, DailyRandom, Brown, Red, Orange, Yellow, Blue
CirrusRainbowHair.Description:
Gives Cirrus a variety of dyed hair colors, or optionally choose a static one.
RealisticRandom gives a delay between hair color changes

DynamicTokens.Name: TenHeartRivalHeartsToggle
DynamicTokens.Value: stopMusic/quickQuestion "Is there anything I can do to help you carry that weight?#You've got responsibilities of your own now, Mateo. Don't forget them!#Just keep being my friend, Mateo! That's the kind of support I need.(break)speak Mateo "I could never, @! Don't worry. $1"(break)speak Mateo "Of course, @! I've got your back.$1"

DynamicTokens.Value: farmer 23 18 2 Hector 24 19 3 Mateo 22 19 1 Cirrus 33 18 2 Sam 33 20 0 Abigail 34 19 0 Sebastian 32 19 0 Gus 13 18 2 Emily 17 17 0 Willy 17 22 2 Clint 19 23 3 Pierre 11 20 0 Shane 21 17 2 Pam 7 18 1 Leah 2 20 1 Elliott 4 19 2 Harvey 18 20 0 Marnie 8 22 3 Lewis 9 22 1

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusIntro_EnD
DynamicTokens.Value: pause 200/emote Cirrus 40/pause 200/speak Cirrus "Sure! I'm actually staying in East Scarp...$1"/globalFade/viewport -999 -999/speak Hector "Excellent! An excuse to get out of here!$9"/speak Mateo "Oh, come on, Biróg. Be nice."/speak Cirrus "No, actually, I agree with them.$6"/message "Cirrus seemed a little nervous at first, but warmed up in the company of you, Mateo & Biróg. You walk her safely back to her van, parked near one of East Scarp's gardens, and part ways for the night."/end

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusIntro_EnD
DynamicTokens.Value: pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp Nova.Eli 14 23/speed Nova.Eli 5/advancedMove Nova.Eli false 0 -2 12 0 0 -2 5 0 0 -1 1 10/pause 1000/textAboveHead Nova.Eli "SHE'S HERE!! Come on Dylan!" true/faceDirection Clint 0/emote Clint 16 true/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Harvey 1/warp Nova.Dylan 14 23/speed Nova.Dylan 4/advancedMove Nova.Dylan false 0 -2 12 0 0 -2 5 0 1 10/faceDirection Cirrus 3/emote Cirrus 16 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Nova.Dylan "Slow down, idiot!" true/faceDirection Mateo 3/emote Mateo 8/faceDirection Harvey 0/advancedMove Mateo false 0 1 4 10/faceDirection Clint 3/pause 2000/shake Nova.Eli 1000/pause 1000/speak Nova.Eli "Holy shit. It's really you!$7"/speak Cirrus "In the flesh!$1"/pause 500/playSound throw true/positionOffset Nova.Eli 110 0/showFrame Nova.Eli 28/showFrame Cirrus 28/emote Nova.Eli 20 true/pause 500/emote Nova.Dylan 32/shake Nova.Eli 1000 true/shake Cirrus 1000/pause 1000/speak Nova.Eli "I've missed you SO much! You're looking fantastic!$3"/showFrame Nova.Eli 4 true/playSound dwop/shake Nova.Eli 200/warp Nova.Eli 32 18/pause 500/speak Mateo "You two know each other?$36"/faceDirection Cirrus 2 true/faceDirection Nova.Eli 2/emote Cirrus 60/speak Nova.Eli "You could say that! Cirrus is our best mate, we go way back.$12#$b#We were meant to be waiting for her but Dylan slowed us down.$10"/emote Nova.Dylan 16 true/jump Nova.Dylan/speak Nova.Dylan "Excuse me? *I* slowed us down?? You're the one who was so anxious that you spilled coffee everywhere, which I had to mop up!$7"/textAboveHead Hector "Ehehehe!"/advancedMove Cirrus false 0 1 -1 0 3 10/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1500/speak Cirrus "I missed you too, Dylan! Can I get a hug from you as well?$1"/speak Nova.Dylan "Oh go on then, if you must... it's good to see you again, Cirrus.$3"/pause 250/positionOffset Cirrus -40 0/showFrame Nova.Dylan 28/showFrame Cirrus 28/shake Nova.Dylan 1000 true/shake Cirrus 1000 true/emote Nova.Eli 32 true/pause 250/emote farmer 32/showFrame Nova.Dylan 4 true/playSound dwop/shake Cirrus 200/warp Cirrus 32 19/250/speak Hector "I guess we don't need to walk you to the Scarp after all, then?$0"/faceDirection Cirrus 1/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Cirrus "I should be good! Eli and Dylan offered to bring me to their place.$0"/speak Nova.Dylan "You and Mateo can feel free to join us, though. It sounded like you were getting on well with Cirrus before we showed up.$1"/jump Nova.Eli/speak Nova.Eli "Yeah! We can ask Gus for a few pizzas to go and put on a movie when we get home. How does that sound?$1"/emote Hector 32 true/speak Mateo "That sounds nice, actually. I'm game for it.$1"/jump Hector/speak Hector "Excellent! An excuse to get out of here!$9"/speak Mateo "Oh, come on, Biróg. Be nice."/speak Cirrus "No, actually, I agree with them.$6"/globalFade/viewport -999 -999/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/speak Sam "No way! How come THEY get to hug her?!$8"/speak Abigail "Right?? Eli never told me he's besties with THE Cirrus!$7"/speak Sebastian "...$2"/message "Cirrus seemed a little nervous at first, but warmed up in the company of you, Mateo, Biróg and her best friends. Her van is parked in front of the Moray brother's house, and you have a fun time at the impromptu party."/end

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong1
DynamicTokens.Value: try looking at the sun. Keep your head high, and everything is alright.

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong1
DynamicTokens.Value: look into the blue sky, and your feelings might be soaked up in it's vastness.

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong2
DynamicTokens.Value: you might be able to find the answers that you want above the clouds.

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong2
DynamicTokens.Value: you might find that answers you want in the light of the moon.

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong3
DynamicTokens.Value: Be free of your mind, and let it flow.

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusSong3
DynamicTokens.Value: Open up your heart, and let things go.

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: It's Wizard time. I cast FIREBALL!

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: The Count's side of the room is engulfed in flames. Thankfully, it's large enough that your party members aren't impacted.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: I send my miniature giant space hamster after Brahd, then nock an arrow and shoot it at him while he's distracted!

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: The Count is distracted by the absurdity of your animal companion, and takes your arrow straight to the chest.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: I charge at Brahd, bashing him with my shield for the first attack and smiting him for the second!

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: He reels back! You got him right in the eye with the corner of the shield, and slashed his chest real good citing the power of your oath.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: I open by viciously mocking Brahd: 'I hate to judge a book by its cover, but you look all cover and no pages.'

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: The Count, who's basically never had his feelings hurt by a mere mortal, is so flabbergasted that he's unable to do anything but process what you just said.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: I point my mace at Brahd, calling on my patron, The God of Light, to intervene!

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: Your God completely reinvigorates your entire party, and newly lent strength courses through everyone.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassQQ
DynamicTokens.Value: I meld with the darkness and move from shadow to shadow to sneak around Brahd, and attack him from behind!

DynamicTokens.Name: DnDClassResponse
DynamicTokens.Value: You're able to step from the shadows right behind Brahd, getting him clean in the ribs with your daggers.$13

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt2
DynamicTokens.Value: Thanks for everything, @. Really. This wouldn't be the same without you.$6

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt2
DynamicTokens.Value: Thanks for everything, @. Maybe I can show my appreciation once everyone clears out.$24

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt3
DynamicTokens.Value: It means a lot, coming from you. You packed up and moved here, completely starting over... it was inspiring, really. Gave me the courage to do something similar.$1

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt3
DynamicTokens.Value: I'm proud of myself, too. But, ya'know, happiness is starting to look pretty you-shaped...$23

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt4
DynamicTokens.Value: fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Half of The Lion's Mane is open for business, and everyone involved seems in good spirits!"

DynamicTokens.Name: CirrusFlirt4
DynamicTokens.Value: I'm proud of myself, too. But, ya'know, happiness is starting to look pretty you-shaped...$23

DynamicTokens.Name: Cirrus10HEnding
DynamicTokens.Value: speak Cirrus "Thank you for everything, @. If it was for you and your friends - sorry, our friends - I don't think any of this would've fallen into place.$17#$b#For the first time in ages, I feel passionate about music again... genuinely! Not just performatively for my job, or because of expectations I set for myself...$11#$b#I'm going to make good on these powers. Hone them to a sharp point! And you too, @! We'll do this together!$10"/end

DynamicTokens.Name: Cirrus10HEnding
DynamicTokens.Value: message "Mateo and Biróg bid you both farewell for the evening."/warp Mateo -100 -100 true/warp Hector -100 -100 true/warp Cirrus 26 30 true/showFrame Cirrus 0 true/faceDirection Cirrus 2 true/warp farmer 26 31 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/stopAnimation Cirrus/viewport 26 27/advancedMove farmer false 0 2 2 10/textAboveHead Cirrus "Wait, Rockstar-"/emote farmer 8/waitForAllStationary/advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 4 10/pause 500/speak Cirrus "Kiss me before you go.$23"/pause 500/positionOffset farmer 0 -4/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 0 -4/pause 5/positionOffset farmer 0 -4/showFrame farmer 15/specificTemporarySprite heart 26 28/showFrame Cirrus 39/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Cirrus "Now that I've got you, I don't want to let you go...$25"/quickQuestion Stay the night? #Yes! (End the day). #I wish I could, but... (End the event).(break)\warp farmer 18 5 true\faceDirection farmer 1 true\warp Cirrus 20 5 true\faceDirection Cirrus 3 true\positionOffset farmer 40 0 true\positionOffset farmer 0 20 true\positionOffset Cirrus -40 0 true\changePortrait Cirrus beach\changeSprite Cirrus beach\globalFadeToClear\viewport 27 14\speak Cirrus "@, you're very easy to love. Your actions speak so loudly, and they're always so kind.$4#$b#We'll master Bardics together. And that's not all - I see a future with you, @. You make me really happy, and I hope you feel the same.$23"\animate Cirrus false true 100 28 28\animate farmer false true 100 101 101\specificTemporarySprite heart 19 3\positionOffset Cirrus -2 0\positionOffset farmer 2 0\pause 100\positionOffset Cirrus -2 0\positionOffset farmer 2 0\positionOffset Cirrus -2 0\positionOffset farmer 2 0\pause 2500\fade\viewport -1000 -1000\end newDay(break)speak Cirrus "That's okay, babe. I know you're busy - there's always, always gonna be a next time. Good night, get home safe. Love you.$23"\end

CirrusRainbowHair.Description: Gives Cirrus a variety of dyed hair colors, or optionally choose a static one.

CirrusRainbowHair.Name: MateoFlirt4
CirrusRainbowHair.Value: the love of my life, and all else.$4

CirrusRainbowHair.Name: RoslinStygiumComment
CirrusRainbowHair.Value: You stand a chance to be more familliar than anyone else here, considering the pendant made of Stygium around @'s neck.

CirrusRainbowHair.Name: RoslinStygiumComment
CirrusRainbowHair.Value: I know you've seen Stygium in the mines underneath East Scarp. Have you questioned where it comes from?$17
